head.title: Republic Engineered Steels Inc.(REPS,NNM) reports earnings for 4th qtr to Jun 30

hedline.hl1: Republic Engineered Steels Inc.(REPS,NNM) reports earnings for 4th qtr to Jun 30

block.p: b-Included noncash Employee Stock Option Plan (ESOP) charges of $ 9,031,000, or 27 cents a share, in the quarter, and $ 33,448,000, or $ 1.55 a share, in the year. Excluding noncash ESOP charges and deferred compensation charges and using a 40 percent state and federal tax rate, earnings per share were 52 cents a share, in the quarter, and excluding noncash ESOP charges and using same rate for state and federal tax rate, earnings per share were 77 cents a share, in the year. c-Included noncash ESOP charges of $ 8,196,000; a charge of $ 330,000 related to deferred compensation; and a gain of $ 6,222,000 from postretirement benefit obligations. Excluding noncash ESOP charges and deferred compensation charges and using a 40 percent state and federal tax rate, earnings per share were 60 cents a share. d-Included noncash ESOP charges of $ 31,270,000, and a charge of $ 330,000 related to deferred compensation. Excluding noncash ESOP charges and deferred compensation charges and using same rate for state and federal tax rate, the loss was 26 cents a share. (Loss) The results for the latest periods were after preferred-dividend payments of $ 805,000 in the quarter and $ 6,042,000 in the year, compared with $ 1,165,000 and $ 5,733,000 in year-ago periods, respectively.
